Blindfear::

Blindfear followed them


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Jume/Whee::
> 
>     Triggerhappy, Skullgrin, Jume and Whee all arrived at the Dark 
Avian.  Triggerhappy and Skullgrin transformed to robot mode.  They 
looked at Jume and Whee.
> 
>     "Do the same, you dildocons," Triggerhappy said, then spat some 
oil on the ground and rubbed it in with his foot.
> 
>     Jume and Whee were at the kind of silence you can hear for a 
moment, then they each transformed to robot mode.
> 
>      Skullgrin kneecapped Y- I mean -Triggerhappy.
> 
>      "Dildocons!?" Skullgrin whispered angrily, "Real smart!  
That's sure to make them take less time about considering the 
Decepticons!  So don't insult 'em....to much."
> 
>      Triggerhappy nodded, then spat again, and looked at Jume and 
Whee.
> 
>      "Well, come on in the base.  Yer on the friend list now," 
Triggerhappy said.
>  
>      Jume and Whee looked at each other, then followed Skullgrin 
and Triggerhappy as they walked into the base.  
> 
>      "Hey everybody, we got ourselves some new Decepticons!  Meet 
Jume and Whee!" Triggerhappy shouted.
> 
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ~~~~~~~LurkerAbyss~~~~~~~
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ~The Keeper Of Souls~
> ~The Shadow Of The Dark~
> ~I Am The Lurker Of The Abyss~
